div.p: Immunization codes constrained from the DSTU core to include only 'completed' and 'enter-in-error' which are the only two clinically relevent values.
Codes that may be used for implementation of the Argonaut Immunization IG and MU2015 certification.

tr.td: All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.

description.value: Immunization codes constrained from the STU core to include only 'completed' and 'enter-in-error' which are the only two clinically relevent values.
